item.description:
What is Satsang? It is a time to experience being in the presence and receiving the wisdom of a true spiritual Teacher (also known as a Guru or Master). During this experience, the Teacher may transmit spiritual energy and knowing to the student, that helps to raise the student's consciousness. The Teacher brings us to experience more of Reality, which heals us. When spiritual seekers spend time in the presence of the Teacher, absorbing the energy and wisdom and allowing themselves to be changed by it, over time they will find that they have risen to a new and higher place of living and being, which also has profound effects on the peace and prosperity of their lives.

What happens during a Satsang? We never know ahead of time. The Teacher may speak, answer questions, sing, give blessings... whatever the Teacher perceives is the need of those present. So come, leave the clangor of the world for an evening. Bring your open heart and mind, and experience the soul-changing grace that comes to you through Satsang with a Holy Guru. Everyone welcome, from all faiths and traditions. Suggested Donation: $25
